entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
